1: <mistake>@@/par</mistake> bya//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs <mistake>so //rlung</mistake> mtshams phyi rol pa bzung <mistake>nas //thig</mistake> le u yig sbyor bar bya//dbus las dbu ma de bzhin
2: du//me mtshams <mistake>sta'</mistake> dang ldan pa yi//lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya//shar las dang po gang yin pa//sgra yig e yis brgyan pa ste//dbang ldan phyi rol gang yin pa//sgra yig e ni sbyor
3: bar bya//lho las dang po gang yin pa//gnyis pa ru ni <mistake>sbor</mistake> byas la//thig le e yig ldan par bya//de yang <mistake>drg</mistake> par 'gyur ba <mistake>ste //byang</mistake> las dbu ma de bzhin du//dbu ma'i <mistake>tham</mistake> yang yin <mistake>te/</mistake>
4: nub las dang po rtag tu ni//a yig med par 'gyur ba'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas//thig le <mistake>u</mistake> yig ldan par
5: bya//dbus las dbu ma bzung ba <mistake>dang //memtshams</mistake> stan dang ldan <mistake>payi//lo</mistake> <mistake>la</mistake> dbu ma 'gyur byas <mistake>e//yi</mistake> ge a dang ldan par bya//dbus las tha ma bzung nas su//bden bral 'dab mar
6: gnas pa <mistake>yang//dbus</mistake> las dang po bzung nas su//sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya//dbang ldan <mistake>phy</mistake> rol pa nyid la//sgra yig <mistake>i</mistake> dang sbyor bar bya//dbus las tha ma bzung nas su//nub las dang
7: po yang bzung <mistake>ste //a</mistake> yig med par byas pa ni//mkha' 'gro ma yi grags <mistake>pa'o//go</mistake> <mistake>r'</mistake> <mistake>rtso</mistake> <mistake>riI</mistake> <mistake>phra</mistake> mo <mistake>pha//e ta</mistake> <mistake>la'</mistake> zhes bya ba bzhi//rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dag <mistake>yan//bu ka</mistake> <mistake>s'I</mistake> dang <mistake>tsan a</mistake> <mistake>'UM //gyas</mistake> ma
8: <mistake>khag</mistake> 'thung 'dra ba bzhi//rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dag yin//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas//sgra yig <mistake>ae</mistake> dang ldan par bya//dbus las dbu ma de bzhin <mistake>te//memtshams</mistake> 'dab ma stan ldan
